org.terrier.structures.indexing

Class TermPayloadDocumentPostingList<PAYLOAD>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.indexing.DocumentPostingList
      • org.terrier.structures.indexing.TermPayloadDocumentPostingList<PAYLOAD>
  • Type Parameters:
    PAYLOAD - the payload type

    public class TermPayloadDocumentPostingList<PAYLOAD>
extends org.terrier.structures.indexing.DocumentPostingList
    Represents the payload postings of one document. Uses HashMaps internally.

    Properties:

    • indexing.avg.unique.terms.per.doc - number of unique terms per doc on average, used to tune the initial size of the hashmaps used in this class.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.terrier.structures.indexing.DocumentPostingList
